caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. SEAN MICHAEL MOINETTE, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Pierce County, No. 05-1-05298-0, Bryan E. Chushcoff, J., entered April 28, 2006.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Hunt, J., concurred in by Bridgewater and Quinn-Brintnall, JJ.
